items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t know whether he should go to the party or not.
Tom and his family came to the train station to see us off.
Tom and his friends sat around the campfire and sang songs.
Tom and some of his friends are planning on robbing a bank.
Tom asked Mary to listen carefully to everything John said.
Tom asked Mary where she planned to be on Saturday evening.
Tom ate the last slice of bread so Mary had nothing to eat.
I\'m so tired that I\'m going to bed as soon as I get home.
I\'m sure that I won\'t be as busy tomorrow as I was today.
I\'ve been trying to find a way to reach Tom, but I can\'t.
